acts_as_searchable

This library adds fulltext searching capabilities based on Hyper Estraier (hyperestraier.sourceforge.net/) to an ActiveRecord model.

Pre-requisites

A working Hyper Estraier instance, setup instructions:

  • hyperestraier.sourceforge.net/nguide-en.html

Resources

Install

  • gem install acts_as_searchable

Bugtracking

  • trac.poocs.net/projects/plugins

Rubyforge project

  • rubyforge.org/projects/ar-searchable

RDocs

  • ar-searchable.rubyforge.org

Subversion

  • svn://poocs.net/plugins/acts_as_searchable
